casebody.data:
Marvin FRANCOIS, Petitioner-Appellant, v. Louie L. WAINWRIGHT, Respondent-Appellee. No. 83-5775. United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. May 28, 1985. Joel N. Rosenthal, Miami, Fla., for petitioner-appellant. Calvin Fox, Asst. Atty. Gen., Miami, Fla., for respondent-appellee.

*1188ON APPLICATION FOR RECALL OF MANDATE

Before FAY and ANDERSON, Circuit Judges, and MARKEY *, Chief Judge of the Federal Circuit.

Honorable Howard T. Markey, U.S. Circuit Judge for the Federal Circuit, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

Appellant’s emergency motion for recall of the mandate is DENIED.
